title: Whose Eggs Are These?
description: While reading descriptions of different eggs, students are encouraged to guess the types of eggs in Whose Eggs Are These? After reading each description, students can find the answer on the following page.
reviewWords: butterfly, case, feathers, frog, pearls, penguin, robin, shark, silk, spider, spiny, tadpoles, twigs
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main details
awareness: Manipulate Initial Sound                : Manipulate initial sounds
grammar: Adjectives                : Identify and understand adjectives in text
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Recognize, write, and understand the use of high-frequency words this and these
